1.title: Birth
1.plot: The Waiters are back. Sauce Bar and Grill welcomes some new faces to madness. It's Sinead's, Cammy's and Luke's first day on the job. Good luck. How will they handle the demands of hospitality? Will they get along with the old recruits Sarah, Quentin, Nikki and Zayn? Not likely. And how the hell will they react when a pregnant woman goes into labor?

2.title: Slippery When Wet
2.plot: It's become apparent that health and safety has fallen by the way side at 'Sauce', so Quentin takes it upon himself to set slippery traps for the other waiters. In the midst of it all Nikki and Sinead further fuel their rivalry, falling for the same waiter.

1.title: Pilot
1.plot: An introduction to the eccentric staff that work at Sauce Bar and Grill. Meet Quentin, the party boy manager. Zayn, the struggling actor. Sarah, the "normal one". Kyle, the Statham look alike. Sheena, the token Asian. And Paul, the flamboyant chef. Let the madness begin.

2.title: Training Day
2.plot: Quentin decides the staff need customer service training and puts them through a series of absurd scenarios to test their reaction to the most difficult customers imaginable. In the midst of this, Alinta is battling with sexual harassment in the workplace.

3.title: New Recruits
3.plot: Quentin and Paul are having a slow Friday night at Sauce and decide to hold a round of interviews for new kitchen and wait staff. Little do the interviewees know, Quentin and Paul have no intention of hiring anyone and just want to pass the time. As the night goes on, drunken stupor replaces sobriety and the restaurant becomes a night club.

4.title: Starstruck
4.plot: Nikki, the dancing goddess from Ep3 is now a first time waitress at Sauce Bar and Grill. Watch fellow waiters attempt to get her to speed. And just when you thought the waiters couldn't get anymore deranged, Sauce is visited by an international celebrity, prompting a new breed of crazy to ensue.

5.title: Party at the Cross
5.plot: It's Zayn's birthday and the staff have all been paid by Quentin to attend his party in Kings Cross. Getting to the party however, proves difficult for all in a place where drunks, muggers, prostitutes and crazy teens roam the streets.

6.title: Gun Point
6.plot: When an armed robber invades Sauce Bar and Grill and holds the staff at gun point, each employee succumbs to their own devices to survive. Mean while some crazy and seemingly unexpected shenanigans are taking place between Quentin and Sheena downstairs in the office...or was this hinted at all along?

7.title: Bloody Trish
7.plot: Just when you thought Sauce Bar and Grill couldn't get any crazier, the staff tap into the spirit world through a homemade Ouija board after they learn that their former manager, Trish, has tragically died. After successfully contacting Trish, the gang ends up at Waverley Cemetery where they confront their ghostly fears.

8.title: The Weakest Waiter
8.plot: Quentin's father, the owner of 'Sauce Bar and Grill', pays his son a workplace visit. In order to cope Quentin heads straight for the tequila bottle, learning shortly after that because of the restaurants lacklustre performance he must fire one of the Waiters, effective immediately. Who's head will be on the chopping board?.

9.title: Candy's Curtain
9.plot: Quentin takes to the streets to promote 'Sauce Bar and Grill' by promising a complimentary steak and strip show. Disaster strikes when customers actually turn up and neither Paul (chef) or the hired entertainment have shown up. With nothing but their own resources, Quentin, Sarah and Nikki are left to improvise their way through the rest of the night.

10.title: Samurai Showdown
10.plot: 'Sauce' fails to win the title of 'Restaurant of the Year' and Quentin is distraught. Sarah, Sheena and Nikki work together to restore Quentin's confidence in the restaurant whilst teaching him a few skills along the way. Zayn returns to 'Sauce' wielding a samurai sword and seeking bloody vengeance. Let the fight begin.
